trans-unit.source: Represents a selection of content that an annotation is anchored to.
trans-unit.target: 表示選取的註解所錨定的內容。

trans-unit.source: TextAnchor is the object type of the returned <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo.ResolvedAnchor%2A> if you are using sticky notes and highlights in flow or fixed documents.
trans-unit.target: TextAnchor 是傳回之物件類型<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo.ResolvedAnchor%2A>如果您使用 「 自黏便箋及流量或固定格式文件中的反白顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo.ResolvedAnchor%2A>

trans-unit.source: TextAnchor is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 中導入 TextAnchor [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] 3.5 版。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the end position of the text anchor.
trans-unit.target: 取得文字錨點的結束位置。

trans-unit.source: BoundingEnd is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 中導入 BoundingEnd [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] 3.5 版。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The end position of the text anchor.
trans-unit.target: 該文字錨點的結束位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the beginning position of the text anchor.
trans-unit.target: 取得文字錨點的起始位置。

trans-unit.source: BoundingStart is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 中引進 BoundingStart [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] 3.5 版。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The beginning position of the text anchor.
trans-unit.target: 該文字錨點的開始位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the text anchor is equal to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出文字錨點是否等於指定的物件。

trans-unit.source: Equals is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 中引進等於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)]3.5 版。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two instances are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果兩個執行個體相等。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code of the text anchor instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回文字錨點執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: GetHashCode is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: 中導入 GetHashCode [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] 3.5 版。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The hash code of the text anchor instance.
trans-unit.target: 文字錨點執行個體的雜湊碼。
